tp:docstring.p: Login object can be used to login, logout and switch user.

method.name: loginUser
method.tp:docstring: Login the user. 'loginUser' is different from 'switchUser' in a way that login will fail if there is already a user who is logged in.

arg.name: password
arg.tp:docstring: password to be used for user login.

method.name: switchUser
method.tp:docstring: Logout the currently logged in user (if any), and login new user. 'loginUser' is different from 'switchUser' in a way that login will fail if there is already a user who is logged in.

arg.name: username
arg.tp:docstring: name of the user to be loggedin

arg.name: password
arg.tp:docstring: password to be used for user to login.
